TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExpressionEditorService

summary.span: 创建或关闭表达式编辑器。

span.span: Creates or closes expression editors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表达式编辑器是在 Visual Studio 中用来编辑表达式的 Visual Basic 控件。An expression editor is a Visual Basic control used to edit expressions inside Visual Studio. 此控件提供全面的 IDE 编辑体验，包括 IntelliSense、着色、ParamInfo、错误波形曲线和其他功能。This control provides a full-fledged IDE editing experience, including IntelliSense, colorization, ParamInfo, error squiggles, among other features. 也可用于管理自定义表达式编辑器的实例。The can also be used to manage instances of custom expression editors. 若要注册自定义表达式编辑器，必须使用以下代码发布 ：To register a custom expression editor, you must publish the using the following code : `this.expressionEditorService = new ExpressionEditorService();` `this.workflowDesigner.Context.Services.Publish(this.expressionEditorService);` 当某个 实例获得焦点以及由于有效表达式失去焦点或重载设计器而被销毁时，将创建一个表达式编辑器。An expression editor is created when an instance gains focus and is destroyed on losing focus of a valid expression, or on reloading of the designer. 默认表达式编辑器不能在重新承载的应用程序中使用。The default expression editor is not available for use in rehosted applications. 如果在重新承载的应用程序中使用了默认表达式编辑器，则只能使用文本框进行编辑。If the default expression editor is used in a rehosted application, a text box is available for editing. 但是，可以通过在重新承载的应用程序中发布 ，在该应用程序中使用自定义表达式编辑器。However, custom expression editors can be used in a rehosted application by publishing the in the application. 如果在自定义活动设计器中使用了 控件，则必须使用此接口来创建和销毁表达式编辑器。If you are using an control in a custom activity designer, it is not necessary to create and destroy expression editors using this interface. 类可为您管理此过程。The class manages this for you.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CloseExpressionEditors ();

public: void CloseExpressionEditors();
abstract member CloseExpressionEditors : unit -> unit

summary.span: 关闭所有启动的表达式编辑器。

span.span: Closes all the active expression editors.

span.span: Creates a new expression editor.
